column4: hey, Error: Dependency is not satisfiable: libglib2.0-0 - I've gotten this message when trying to install dconf-gsettings-backend. libglib is definitely installed though.
what is the output of "cat /etc/issue" and "cat /etc/apt/sources.list"
http://pastebin.com/wBUt7ZPD
outpout of "apt-cache policy libglib2.0-0"
http://pastebin.com/VJTe6bAV
any thoughts?
as it seems everything fine with your repos
what program you tried to install when that was happening?
dconf-gsettings-backend
can you paste me the outout of "apt-get changelog dconf-gsettings-backend"
invalid operation?
ah seems not to be default
woah wait a moment. this isn't lucid. this is oneric
your pastes says you are on lucid
e.g. http://pastebin.com/VJTe6bAV
so you are on the wrong system, destroyed your system or you are really on lucid
what is th4e source you are installing this dconf-thing from?
http://www.ubuntuupdates.org/package/gnome_3/natty/main/base/dconf-gsettings-backend
you see that it is for natty?
now you know why you are facing dependency issues
yeah, sorry about that, it's quite late here and I forgot which system this was.
dont mix packages from different releases it will normally end in dependency issues
I usually don't :p
